1.1.name: wordpress/thesis-sidebar-teasers
1.1.description:
What does it do? This plugin allows you to insert Thesis Teasers inside a sidebar. It doesn’t include all the options that you would normally expect. In a future release, it might.

Requirements: This plugin for Wordpress requires that you’re using the Thesis theme (1.5 or higher.)

Questions & Comments? Leave a comment at http://www.webdesigncompany.net/thesis-sidebar-teasers/ and I’ll respond as soon as I can.
